p: The ability of rabbit plasma to scavenge the ABTS •+ was measured using the method of Re et al. [ 31], as adapted by Balasundram [ 32]. In short, this assay measures the ability of antioxidants in the plasma, at the absorbance of 734 nm, to scavenge preformed ABTS •+ produced using the oxidation of ABTS with potassium persulfate. The ABTS •+ scavenging capacity of the plasma is reported in terms of mg/mL Trolox equivalents (mg/mL TE).
